thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Justin

author: Justin
title: Justin
text: After looking at a few Holden dealerships and no being very impressed with the service i come into moorooka holden just by chance as i was passing the place during work hours and just by luck i happened to start talking with kristy and felt very comfortable and equel in terms of conversation and i honestly believe this lady deserves a bonus, there was nothing she could not do to help more and if you get the chance to buy a new car from here make sure u ask for her you will not regret it and i would like to also thank Allan the sales manager who with out hesitation lent me the demo Colorado for a few days. Without a doubt this has been the best experience buying a new holden colorado from moorooka holden
